wikipedia_page.main: Tom Glynn-Carney (born 7 February 1995) is an English actor and singer. He is best known for his supporting role in Christopher Nolan's war film Dunkirk (2017).

response: Tom Glynn-Carney portrays Hotspur in The King (2019 film).

link_mentions.page: Guildhall School of Music and Drama

response: In September 2021, it was announced that a new West End production of the play would be opening in May 2022 at the Duke of York's Theatre and would star Amy Adams as Amanda, alongside Paul Hilton, Tom Glynn-Carney, Lizzie Annis and Victor Alli.

* The Ferryman by Jez Butterworth, directed by Sam Mendes, starring Paddy Considine, Laura Donnelly, Genevieve O'Reilly, Bríd Brennan, Fra Fee, Stuart Graham, Gerard Horan, Conor MacNeill, Dearbhla Molloy, Tom Glynn-Carney, and Niall Wright (2017)
